articles.title: EU opens formal probe of TikTok under Digital Services Act, citing child safety, risk management & other concerns - TechCrunch
articles.description: The European Union is formally investigating TikTok's compliance with the bloc's Digital Services Act (DSA), the Commission has announced. Areas the
